Text: Thanks VERY much!! I'm a huge fan of Rowling, so I really wanted to watch this (superb) documentary. Just to let others know, this is a SAFE file, and I believe its a Divx file. Can someone else clarify that?

Please help seed this, i'll seed it for an eternity if you'd just hand it over to me faster than 
1,2kbp/s once in a while :p

Brilliant upload, I loved this; I didn't get to watch it all as I was busy.

Thank you.

I had already seen this inteview on one of the Harry Potter DVDs - and if you haven't seen this one yet, it is highly recommended that you do - and was wondering if anyone had the one called J.K. Rowling: Harry Potter and Me. It's the one where you hear random bits of the books, read by Stephen Fry. 
If anyone have it, please upload it or get back to me, thanks.
